SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , A.MARKET , A.KOR_NM , TO_CHAR(B.OPENING_PRICE, '999,999,999,999,9990.00') AS OPENING_PRICE , TO_CHAR(B.LOW_PRICE, '999,999,999,999,9990.00') AS LOW_PRICE , TO_CHAR(B.HIGH_PRICE, '999,999,999,999,9990.00') AS HIGH_PRICE , B.RISE_PRICE , B.CHANGE , B.TRADE_DATE FROM T_COIN_QUOTE_KRW A , ( SELECT MARKET , OPENING_PRICE , LOW_PRICE , HIGH_PRICE , ROUND((((HIGH_PRICE - OPENING_PRICE) / OPENING_PRICE) * 100), 2) AS RISE_PRICE /* 시가 - 고가 상승률 */ , DECODE(CHANGE, 'RISE', '상승', 'FALL', '하락') AS CHANGE , B.TRADE_DATE FROM T_COIN_RACE_KRW B WHERE 1=1
AND TRADE_DATE = #searchTRADE_DATE#
AND TRADE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(TRADE_DATE) FROM T_COIN_RACE_KRW)
AND MARKET LIKE '%' || FN_GET_MARKET(#{searchKOR_NM}) || '%' /* 한글명을 MARKET으로 변환하여 대입 */
ORDER BY RISE_PRICE DESC ) B WHERE A.MARKET = B.MARKET ORDER BY RNUM ASC
SELECT MAX(UPD_DT) AS UPD_DT FROM T_COIN_RACE_KRW WHERE MARKET = 'KRW-BTC'
